text: sAqkShAdEqva sO#mapIqthamava# rundhEq &gnayE# dAqtrE pu#rOqDASa#maqShTAka#pAlaqM nirva#pEqdindrA#ya pradAqtrE pu#rOqDASaqmEkA#daSakapAlaM paqSukA#mOq&gnirEqvAsmai# paqSUn pra#jaqnaya#ti vRuqddhAnindraqH pra ya#cCatiq dadhiq madhu# GRuqtamApO# dhAqnA Ba#vantyEqtadvai pa#SUqnA(gm) rUqpa(gm) rUqpENaiqva paqSUnava# rundhE pa~jca-gRuhIqtaM Ba#vatiq pA~gktAq hi paqSavO# bahu rUqpaM Ba#vati bahu rUqpA hi paqSavaqH-  [  ]  13
